course_title: Special Topics in Statistics - STAT COMPUTING

201.comments: Statistical computing topics covered include:R statistical software, reproducible code, pseudo-code, writing functions,documentation, validation, debugging, numerical methods, profiling.Please refer to the following link for further information http://ugrad.stat.ubc.ca/~hjoe/stat447/A team project will be a major activity.Pre-reqs: Stat 306

description: Students should consult the Statistics Department for the particular topics offered in a given year.
